block.l: if (typeof ecraft2learn === 'object') { ecraft2learn.run(function_name, parameters); } else { var script = document.createElement("script"); script.type = "text/javascript"; script.src = "https://ecraft2learn.github.io/ai/ecraft2learn.js"; script.addEventListener('load', function () { ecraft2learn.run(function_name, parameters); }); document.head.appendChild(script); }

block-definition.s: Train using camera with buckets %'bucket names' add to any earlier training %'add to previous training'
block-definition.comment: This will launch a training window where you can show the system examples of each of the labels in 'bucket names'. If 'add to previous training' is false then training will start over from scratch.
